timeline.message: Import files by track in memory (avoid clean track when error). Fixes #473.

timeline.bodyText: I wouldn't encapsulate SQLiteConstraintException, because it didn't happen here.
timeline.author: pstorch

replies.author: rgmf

replies.bodyText:
Normally I don't like translating Exception messages, but in this case we show it to the user. So it might be appropriate.
@dennisguse what do you think?
replies.author: pstorch
